Translations.Text: Tada anata no nushi kara no jihi wa betsu de. Anata ni taisuru kare no onkei wa, hontoni kodaidearu
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Tatoe ningen to Jin ga issho ni natte, kono kuruan to onajiyona mono o motarasou to kyoryoku shite mo,(totei) kono yona mono o motarasu koto wa dekinai
Ware wa kuruan no naka de, shuju no hiyu o agete hitobito ni setsumei shita. Soredemo hitobito no oku wa, fushinjin hitosuji ni (sono ukeire o) kyohi suru
Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi no tame ni, anata ga ji kara izumi o waki dasa seru made wa, anata o shinjinaidearou
Matawa anata ga natsumeyashi ya budo no en o shoyu shi, sonoaida o kayotte yutaka ni kawa o nagare sasu made wa
Matawa anata ga (ariuru to) genmei shita yo ni, ozora o kona go nani shite watashi-tachi ni otosu made. Mata arra soshite tenshi-tachi o,(watashi-tachi no) menzen ni tsuretekuru made

Matawa anata ga, kogane (no soshoku) no ie o mochi,(hashigo o funde) ten ni noboru made wa. Iya, watashi-tachi ni yomeru keiten o motte kudaru made, anata no shoten o mo shinjinaidearou.' Itte yaru ga i. `Omo ni tatae are, watashi wa shito to shite (noko wa sa reta) hitori no ningen nisuginaide wanai ka

Michibiki ga kare-ra ni kudasa reta toki, hitobito no shinjin o samatageta no wa, kare-ra ga,`arra wa (watashi-tachi to onaji) hitori no ningen o, shito to shite noko wa sa reta no ka.' To itta (koto) nihokanaranai
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Moshi chijo o yuyu to yukiki shite iru no ga tenshinara, ware wa kitto ichi tenshi o shito to shite, ten kara kare-ra ni noko wa shita kotodearou
Itte yaru ga i. `Arra wa, watashi to anata gata to no ma no rissho-sha to shite banzende ara reru. Hontoni kare wa, sono shimo be-tachi o shiri tsukushi, mite ora reru katadearu
